name: <3 or X
description:
Less than 3 or X is a game about finding the perfect robot to date while obliterating the competition. You will have to judge the bots by their cheesy pickup lines! 

When the cards are standing straight, use the mouse to click on the [♥] & [X] buttons on the cards;  when fighting the bots use your keyboard – [W] to jump and [Space] to shoot.

This game was made in around 5 days for the GoedWare Game Jam #5, it would benefit from some more game content and polish; for all intents and purposes, I'd consider this a demo.
